description: Each term a(n) satisfies four properties: 1, divisible by all prime factors of n; 2, divisible by only the prime factors of n; 3, not equal to any of the terms a(1), a(2), ... a(n-1); 4, smallest number satisfying 1-3 if A005361(n) is even, or second smallest number satisfying 1-3 if A005361(n) is odd.
